games.name: Valorant
games.description: A tactical 5v5 character-based shooter where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities. Compete in ranked matches and prove your skills in this free-to-play competitive FPS.

games.name: The Witcher 3
games.description: An epic fantasy RPG following Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter in a vast open world. Features rich storytelling, complex characters, moral choices, and extensive side quests in a beautifully crafted medieval fantasy setting.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto V
games.description: An open-world action-adventure game set in Los Santos. Play as three different protagonists in an interconnected story of heists, crime, and survival in a satirical recreation of modern Southern California.

games.name: Overwatch 2
games.description: A team-based hero shooter featuring diverse heroes with unique abilities. Fight for the future in 6v6 battles across iconic locations in this fast-paced competitive FPS.

games.name: Fall Guys
games.description: A colorful battle royale party game featuring jellybean-like characters competing in wacky obstacle courses. Survive elimination rounds and be the last bean standing in this fun multiplayer experience.

games.name: Guild Wars 2
games.description: A popular mmorpg game featuring fantasy elements. Guild Wars 2 offers engaging gameplay with modern graphics and immersive experiences.

games.name: League of Legends
games.description: A competitive 5v5 MOBA where two teams of champions battle to destroy the enemy Nexus. Choose from over 160 unique champions and climb the ranked ladder in this free-to-play esports phenomenon.

games.name: Candy Crush Saga
games.description: A popular match-three puzzle game where players swap colored candies to create matches and clear levels. Features hundreds of levels, special candies, and social features. Perfect for casual gaming sessions.
